extendedInfo.description: Application Description- Self-lead course with reading, writing, coloring and playing games- Chant and song to say the Alphabet letters.For Whom? - Kids who start to learn EnglishÂ·Kids who want to learn English Alphabet Contents Â·Alphabet A to EÂ·Words which start with A to EÂ·Alphabet Chant, Letter, Coloring and GameÂ·A variety of images and activities You Will Learn aboutÂ·How to articulate the Alphabet soundsÂ·How to write Alphabet lettersChant: Play and listen to the chant.Letter: Choose a color and write the Alphabet trace with the brush. Color: Choose a color and color the picture with the brush.Game: You will be given two words. Find the picture that matches the each sound.* Email : susia@edubox.co.kr
